description: This young man was a very skilled bartender, who knew how to put on a show. Too bad his employers didn't value him enough. He decided to get a new job that would be paid accordingly. I offered him a bartending position again but this time at a posh bar. The interview went smoothly until we reached the point when he was supposed to pay our mediation fee. The boy was broke. He was lucky that I like well-built bodies and cute faces so I offered him my help. He didn't look too shocked by the terms and undressed. I admired his nicely shaped figure and thick cock. I expected to have hard time convincing him but I suspect he was a bit bi-curious. The guy was definitely into some serious cock action and knew how to handle a horny dick. After his ass got drilled enough, he jerked me off like crazy.
title: Dirty Scout 199
